blocks.name: cmpt
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include maps-to notation for defining a function via a rule.
blocks.origin: prop class cmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) { (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1) }

blocks.name: diff.cmpt.s
diff.cmpt.c
diff.cmpt.w
df-mpt
blocks.content: Define maps-to notation for defining a function via a rule. Read as "the function which maps ` x ` (in ` A ` ) to ` B ( x ) ` ". The class expression ` B ` is the value of the function at ` x ` and normally contains the variable ` x ` . An example is the square function for complex numbers, ` ( x e. CC |-> ( x ^ 2 ) ) ` . Similar to the definition of mapping in [ChoquetDD] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2008.)

blocks.name: mpteq12f
blocks.content: An equality theorem for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpteq12f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))), wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c1, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wa(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))))
  opabbid(s0, hs0, wa(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfan(s0, wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)))
  nfa1(s0, wceq(c0, c1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))))
  sylan9bbr(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  pm5.32da(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wa(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rspa(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))
  anbi1d(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, c1, wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  sp(s0, wceq(c0, c1))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpteq12f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((∀(s0, c0 = c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3))→(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 = c3)}, (∀(s0, c0 = c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3)))
  opabbid(s0, hs0, (∀(s0, c0 = c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3)), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 = c3))
  nfan(s0, ∀(s0, c0 = c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3))
  nfa1(s0, c0 = c1)
  nfra1(s0, c0, c2 = c3)
  nfv(hs0, (∀(s0, c0 = c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3)))
  sylan9bbr(∀(s0, c0 = c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 = c3), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c3))
  pm5.32da(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3), s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2, hs0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3)∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  rspa(s0, c0, c2 = c3)
  anbi1d(∀(s0, c0 = c1), s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c3, s0 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(s0, c0, c1, ∀(s0, c0 = c1))
  sp(s0, c0 = c1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0, c0 = c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 = c3)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: mpteq12dva
blocks.content: An equality inference for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: mpteq12dv
blocks.content: An equality inference for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: mpteq12df
blocks.content: An equality inference for the maps-to notation. Compare ~ mpteq12dv . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpteq12df(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), w0)
  opabbid(s0, hs0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c3, w0)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpteq12df(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 = c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3)}, w0)
  opabbid(s0, hs0, w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c3))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 = c3)
  eleq2d(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c1, c3, w0)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: nfmpt
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by NM, 20-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfopab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, s1, c0)
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0,(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)})
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfopab(s0, s1, hs0, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  nfan(s0, s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  nfcri(s0, s1, c0)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfmpt1
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by FL, 17-Feb-2008.)

blocks.name: cbvmptf
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution. This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvmptf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  eqtri(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(hs1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  cbvopab1(s0, hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  cbvopab1(hs1, hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfcri(s1, hs1, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeq2(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(hs1, s1, c0)
  sbhypf(hs1, s0, cv(s1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvmptf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)=(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  eqtri({ < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < hs1, hs0 > |(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)})
  cbvopab1(s0, hs0, hs1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1))
  nfv(hs1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  nfan(s0, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, hs0 = c1)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs1, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, hs0 = c1)
  cbvopab1(hs1, hs0, s1, (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  nfan(s1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  nfcri(s1, hs1, c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, hs0 = c1)
  nfeq2(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfv(hs1, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  anbi12d(hs1 = s1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1, s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2)
  eleq1w(hs1, s1, c0)
  sbhypf(hs1, s0, s1, hs0 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: cbvmpt
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution. This version has bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s1, c0, c2), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  eqtri(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(hs1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  cbvopab1(s0, hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  cbvopab1(hs1, hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(s1, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeq2(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eleq1w(hs1, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wsb(s1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sbie(s1, s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)=(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c2), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)})
  eqtri({ < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s1, hs0 > |(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < hs1, hs0 > |(hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)})
  cbvopab1(s0, hs0, hs1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1))
  nfv(hs1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  nfan(s0, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  nfv(s0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, hs0 = c1)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs1, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  eleq1w(s0, hs1, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, hs0 = c1)
  cbvopab1(hs1, hs0, s1, (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧[hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  nfan(s1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  nfv(s1, hs1 ∈ c0)
  nfsb(s1, hs1, s0, hs0 = c1)
  nfeq2(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfv(hs1, (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  anbi12d(hs1 = s1, hs1 ∈ c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1, s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c2)
  eleq1w(hs1, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(hs1 = s1, [hs1 / s0]hs0 = c1, hs0 = c2, [s1 / s0]hs0 = c1)
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, hs0 = c1)
  sbie(s1, s0, hs0 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c2)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.w((s1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: cbvmptv
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2013.)

blocks.name: mptv
blocks.content: Function with universal domain in maps-to notation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2013.)
